General.Name: TPC Co. Ltd
General.Description: TPC Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive parts. It also offers automotive fuel tubes, coolant transfer systems, reducers, and precision steel pipes. The company was formerly known as Taechang Precision Co., Ltd. and changed its name to TPC Co., Ltd. in May 2002. TPC Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Gyeongsan-si, South Korea.
General.Address: 574, Jinyang Town Road, Gyeongsan-si, South Korea
